name: .VOX File Extension
summary: Learn about .VOX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: 3D model created in the Voxel format ("VOX" for short), a blocky 3D format used by the Voxlap game engine; saves the geometry for a game object, such as a character, building, or a weapon; for used for creating video game models and can be edited with the Slab6 program.

content: The Voxlap engine was created by Ken Silverman and is available freely. It has been used for creating games such as Ace of Spades, which uses .KV6 files that are based on the VOX format.

NOTE: A voxel (which stands for "volumetric pixel") is a pixel represented as a cube in 3D space. Therefore, voxel models look like they have been built with LEGO blocks when rendered. The Voxlap VOX format is one of many different voxel formats.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
